item.title: WATCH: 105-year-old woman spends birthday in crown, dancing the day away
item.description: "I love to dance, that's the only thing I do," Antoinette Grande said with a smile.

item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Trump suggests US won't defend allies if they don't pay
item.description: A core tenet of NATO is Article 5, which states that member nations pledge to treat an attack against one as an attack on them all.
